snippet: The S.&P. 500 advanced for the fifth day in a row. Twitter shares were up after the company announced that Jack Dorsey would be chief executive.
abstract: Stocks climb sharply amid investor consensus that Federal Reserve will further delay raising interest rates.
lead_paragraph: The S.&P. 500 advanced for the fifth day in a row. Twitter shares were up after the company announced that Jack Dorsey would be chief executive.

headline.main: Interest Rate Optimism Drives the Market Up
